EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Sponsorship Complete Transfer Child Edit Data Form
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: This performs OCM specific interaction business rules for a tranfer that has already been completed
EditDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

LoadImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDITLOAD_SPONSORSHIP_COMPLETETRANSFERCHILD( @ID uniqueidentifier, @DATALOADED bit = 0 output, @TSLONG bigint = 0 output, @SPONSORID uniqueidentifier = null output, @FROMCHILDID uniqueidentifier = null output, @TOCHILDID uniqueidentifier = null output, @DONORCONTACTCODEID uniqueidentifier = null output, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier = null output
) as begin
set nocount on;
-- be sure to set these, in case the select returns no rows set @DATALOADED = 0 set @TSLONG = 0
-- populate the output parameters, which correspond to fields on the form. Note that -- we set @DATALOADED = 1 to indicate that the load was successful. Otherwise, the system -- will display a "no data loaded" message. Also note that we fetch the TSLONG so that concurrency -- can be considered.
set @DATALOADED = 1
/* select @DATALOADED = 1, @TSLONG = TSLONG from dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION where ID = @ID */ declare @fromSponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = @ID declare @toSponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null
begin try set @SPONSORID = dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR (@ID) if @SPONSORID = null RAISERROR 100000 'Could not find the Sponsor ID'
select @toSponsorshipID = NEXTSPONSORSHIP.ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP join dbo.SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION LASTTRANSACTION on LASTTRANSACTION.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and LASTTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONSEQUENCE = (select max(TRANSACTIONSEQUENCE) from dbo.SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION MAXSEQUENCE where MAXSEQUENCE.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and SPONSORSHIP.ID in(MAXSEQUENCE.CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID,MAXSEQUENCE.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID,MAXSEQUENCE.DECLINEDSPONSORSHIPID) and MAXSEQUENCE.ACTIONCODE <> 9) join dbo.SPONSORSHIP NEXTSPONSORSHIP on NEXTSPONSORSHIP.ID = case when LASTTRANSACTION.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID <> SPONSORSHIP.ID then LASTTRANSACTION.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID end
where sponsorship.id = @fromSponsorshipID and LASTTRANSACTION.ACTIONCODE = 1 -- Transfer
if @FROMSPONSORSHIPID is null or @toSponsorshipID is null RAISERROR 100000 'Could not find the transfered sponsorships'
--** change to use this?? UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_TRANSLATIONFUNCTION
set @FROMCHILDID = (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where ID = @FROMSPONSORSHIPID) set @TOCHILDID = (select SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where ID = @TOSPONSORSHIPID)
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0; end

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_SPONSORSHIP_COMPLETETRANSFERCHILD ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, -- @SPONSORID uniqueidentifier, -- @FROMSPONSORSHIPID uniqueidentifier, -- @TOSPONSORSHIPID uniqueidentifier, @DONORCONTACTCODEID uniqueidentifier, @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID uniqueidentifier ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
--declare @sponsorID uniqueidentifier = null declare @fromSponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = @ID declare @toSponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null
begin try /*set @sponsorID = dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETFINANCIALSPONSOR (@ID) if @sponsorID = null RAISERROR 100000 'Could not find the Sponsor ID' */
select @toSponsorshipID = NEXTSPONSORSHIP.ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP join dbo.SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION LASTTRANSACTION on LASTTRANSACTION.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and LASTTRANSACTION.TRANSACTIONSEQUENCE = (select max(TRANSACTIONSEQUENCE) from dbo.SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION MAXSEQUENCE where MAXSEQUENCE.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPCOMMITMENTID and SPONSORSHIP.ID in(MAXSEQUENCE.CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID,MAXSEQUENCE.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID,MAXSEQUENCE.DECLINEDSPONSORSHIPID) and MAXSEQUENCE.ACTIONCODE <> 9) join dbo.SPONSORSHIP NEXTSPONSORSHIP on NEXTSPONSORSHIP.ID = case when LASTTRANSACTION.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID <> SPONSORSHIP.ID then LASTTRANSACTION.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID end
where sponsorship.id = @fromSponsorshipID and LASTTRANSACTION.ACTIONCODE = 1 -- Transfer
if @fromSponsorshipID is not null and @toSponsorshipID is not null
exec dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CREATECOMPLETETRANSFERINTERACTIONS @fromSponsorshipID = @fromSponsorshipID, @toSponsorshipID = @toSponsorshipID, @donorContactCodeID = @DONORCONTACTCODEID, @interactionTypeCodeID = @INTERACTIONTYPECODEID, @changeAgentID = @CHANGEAGENTID
else RAISERROR 100000 'Could not find the transfer sponsorships'
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
